summary: AN ORDINANCE increasing certain expenditure allowances in the 1989 Budgets of various City departments to provide salary increases for certain City employees consistent with the Management Compensation Study, adopted by Ordinance 114529 on May 22, 1989, by appropriation, reduction, reappropriation, and transfer from the "Management Compensation Study" account in the Department of Finance General, and by reimbursable and partially reimbursable appropriations from various other funds.
